title: To develop eSport

replies.body: Sorry but esport got completely boring over the last 2 years

Well thats ur point of view but can you justify (giving a reason for this opinion) it? 
I think that Esports have become well known and its just so much bigger then it was 2-3 Years ago. If
we just look at the LEC or other big Competitions then u can see the Emotions, Improvment and 
i think we can be thankful for everything we established in Esports.
